meanings.definition: The process of developing and printing photographs.
meanings.sent1: I learned about photofinishing in my photography class.
meanings.sent2: The photofinishing of the family portrait turned out beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The photofinishing of the vacation pictures made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her skill in photofinishing was like turning memories into art.
meanings.sent5: The photofinishing shop was filled with the smell of chemicals and paper.

meanings.definition: The act of completing or enhancing a photograph through various techniques.
meanings.sent1: The photofinishing of the landscape photo made it look even more stunning.
meanings.sent2: She spent hours perfecting the photofinishing of her self-portrait.
meanings.sent3: The photofinishing of the pet picture made the dog look like a model.
meanings.sent4: His attention to detail in photofinishing was like adding magic to the images.
meanings.sent5: The photofinishing tools on the table helped create amazing effects on the photos.

meanings.definition: The industry or business of processing and producing photographs.
meanings.sent1: She found a job in photofinishing and enjoyed working with photos.
meanings.sent2: The photofinishing business was booming due to the demand for printed pictures.
meanings.sent3: In the world of photofinishing, every image tells a story.
meanings.sent4: The photofinishing industry was evolving with new digital technologies.
meanings.sent5: His passion for photofinishing led him to open his own photography studio.
